snippet: Alek Torgersen led Pennsylvania to a 31-7 rout of Columbia as the Lions set an Ivy League record for the longest winning streak against one opponent.
abstract: College Football East Roundup; Pennsylvania routs Columbia, 31-7; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Alek Torgersen led Pennsylvania to a 31-7 rout of Columbia as the Lions set an Ivy League record for the longest winning streak against one opponent.

headline.main: Penn’s 18th Straight Victory Over Columbia Sets a Record
headline.print_headline: Penn’s 18th Straight Victory Over Columbia Sets a Record
